findings.title: #1 State variables that could be declared constant
findings.description: Add the `constant` attributes to state variables that never change

findings.title: #2 Import error
findings.description: Please start an import statement with a dot. import “./access/Ownable.sol”; Instead of import “/access/Ownable.sol”;

findings.title: #3 Don't use raw math arithmetic. Use the SafeMath library
findings.description: Using raw math arithmetic can lead to precision loss or overflow, it's recommended to use the SafeMath library for mathematical operations.
